name: Metis One (itch)
description:
Lost in the midnight skies, Jupiter colony METIS ONE cries out. Alien invasion on it's shores, a solitary signal escapes into the vastness of space. Towards hope. Towards Earth.

Message received! AXIOM STARSONG and LUMIA VESPER, Earth's mightiest pilots, hear the call. Prepare for launch!

Help is on the way!

In Metis One you and a friend take command of specialized fighters to combat the mysterious alien forces that threaten the Sol System.

•Two Player Arcade style drop-in Co-op Campaign
•5+ Stages of intense Shoot 'em Up action!
•Unlock new fighters, gaining access to new ways to play by completing challenges
•Tons of Secrets to Discover
•Infinite Score Attack mode to test your mettle against yourself and friends
•Hi Scores!
•Explosions!
•Lasers!
•Mayhem!
•Fail states!

Visit www.actuatorgames.com for more information.
